title: 21 Savage "No Heart" Official Lyrics & Meaning | Verified

json.text: Yo niggas be like talking, reckless.
They be gangsters here on the internet then when you see their ass, they turn into little hoes.
Shit the hook got down...I was just rappin’ you know freestylin but like the verse, that
was more like my life, you know what I’m sayin?
I’m trappin’ so hard because I gotta get that money man, by all means.
The rent is up.
Just capping, just exaggerating.
Lying, flexing, you know what I’m saying.
Acting like something you not.
I’m praying to my glock and my carbon because that’s what’s going to, you know what
I’m sayin, ride with me.
I sit back and just analyze niggas, you know what I’m sayin.
Read ‘em.
Like Cat in the Hat.
Like how that’s a book, I read niggas like a book.
Know what I’m sayin’ ?
When Ricky got his ass shot on Boyz N the Hood, I’ll pull up on you and shoot your
ass in the back like that, you know what I’m sayin’ but this ain’t Boyz N the hood
this real life.
Shit last night I had what, a hundred and fifteen thousand in the club.
In all hundreds.
I had like thirty in this pocket, thirty in this pocket, thirty in this pocket and like
I think like twenty five in this pocket.
I can fit about two hundred thousand though.
Depending on what jeans I got.
All blue cheese though.
No twenties and fifties just straight hundreds.
Yeah I was playing video games when I was eight, nine.
Some niggas that’s all they did.
They would sit in the house and play the game.
Watch T.V. I was in the street playin’ around with guns and drugs you know what I’m sayin’
so that’s what I meant by that.
I play ‘em now though.
Tom Clancy, shit Grand Theft Auto, UFC, Need For Speed.
I play a whole lot of shit man.
Whatever was goddamn fun.
Guns and driving shit.
You know what I got caught with a gun in school.
And, they locked me up for that shit.
You know what I’m sayin’?
You know how that shit go man.
Shit just happens.
I was wide receiver.
I was on probation so I was just, trying to do something different.
And then they ended up kicking me out of school again so I was like fuck football after that,
you know what I’m sayin?
Ninth grade I was dropping shit, breaking jaws.
But it was just a couple.
You know, lames and niggas who was tryna prove what they is for no reason, so.
Yo man you know, some niggas need Viagra, all that type of shit.
You know, this hoe so thick I don’t need none of that shit my dick gettin’ hard for real.
You know what I’m sayin?
Niggas love sneak dissin on twitter you know what I’m sayin?
I’mma @ your favorite rapper and shoot him like I’m John Dill you know what I’m sayin?
I’m not gonna sneak diss.
Yeah my folks Haitians.
I’m Haitian.
You know what I’m sayin?
My grand daddy Haitian.
Different struggles develop different characteristics in people.
Haitians have very bad struggles in Haiti so that just make them rough, it make them
just operate a little differently than your average suburban ass person, you know what
I’m sayin?
I hang around some real killers, you know what I’m sayin?
People who look up to you the most and wanna be you, or wanna be what you are, do what
you doin, them be the people that hate you the most.
I’m not surprised that somebody who listens to my shit all day probably don’t like me
‘cause that’s what I expect from them.
